member.name: M:WaveEngine.Social.SocialSimulationHelper.GetTopScores(System.String,System.Int32,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Gets the top page of scores for a given leaderboard.
member.param: The maximum number of scores. Must be between 1 and 25.
If true, the result will only contain the scores of players in the viewing player's circles.

If true, this call will clear any locally cached data and attempt to fetch the latest data from the server. This would commonly be used for something like a user-initiated refresh. Normally, this should be set to false to gain advantages of data caching.
member.returns: The scores.

member.name: M:WaveEngine.Social.SocialSimulationHelper.GetPlayerCenteredScores(System.String,System.Int32,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Gets the the player-centered page of scores for a given leaderboard.
member.param: If true, the result will only contain the scores of players in the viewing player's circles.

If true, this call will clear any locally cached data and attempt to fetch the latest data from the server. This would commonly be used for something like a user-initiated refresh. Normally, this should be set to false to gain advantages of data caching.
member.returns: The scores.
